title: Where to look when making Dua in last tashahhud? Keep on moving index finger? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: when I make Dua at the end of my prayer should I keep moving my finger and look at it or look at the place where I put my forehead for sujud no the Sunnah is that when you make Dua before Salam after the salutation upon the prophet Alam you keep on moving your uh index finger and you look at it until you come to offer your Salam then you you stop that and you offer your Salam
